Question: Versogo Tech (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Versogo Tech (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd

Portable Power Stations

- ESS300 (300W Series) with PD 100W fast charging
- ESS600 (600W Series) suitable for home and outdoor use
- ESS1200 (1200W Series) featuring a beautiful design and relentless performance
- ISO9001/ISO14001/BSCI quality system certified
- Products compliant with UL/MFi/Qi certifications
- Factories in Shenzhen and Vietnam with over 700 employees
- Specialized in R&D, manufacture, and sales of Portable Power Stations, Household Energy Storage, and 3C digital accessories
- Design-based customization and ODM services available
Summary_cn:
Versogo Tech（深圳）有限公司

便携式电源

- ESS300（300W系列）支持PD 100W快充
- ESS600（600W系列）适用于家庭和户外使用
- ESS1200（1200W系列）采用精美设计，表现出色
- ISO9001 / ISO14001 / BSCI质量体系认证
- 产品符合UL / MFi / Qi认证
- 在深圳和越南设有工厂，拥有700多名员工
- 专注于便携式电源、家庭能源存储和3C数字配件的研发、制造和销售
- 提供基于设计的定制和ODM服务
